EmailTemplate.subject: Got a case of the office winter blues?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com?utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Bring On Spring! <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/GT-Blog-March-Content-Piece.aspx?cmp=EBBSMARCH2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Your team deserves a fresh start, inspire them by refreshing the office. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/GT-Blog-March-Content-Piece.aspx?cmp=EBBSMARCH2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Learn More <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/dcr/sites/core/GT-Blog-March-Content-Piece.aspx?cmp=EBBSMARCH2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
